Protecting the well-being, safety and health of the citizens of Haryana is a top priority of the Government of Haryana. For this, the government is taking all necessary steps and is well prepared to face the challenge and threat posed by the growing epidemic of COVID 19 - Coronavirus.

Government of Haryana have launched portal : (https://covidssharyana.in/) to enable the following: Covid-19 Sangharsh Senani

 1. Any interested shop / store owner (Kiryana/ vegetable/ milk/ chemist, etc.) can register to supply the required items

2. Anyone who wants to help people by contributing to the fight against the coronavirus can register
